messages.text: (sighs) Never thought I would be dumped inside an US Prison.
Calm down Dimitry. We are agents. We should be ready to face this.
I think its all over. Probably they'll deport us to the Guantanamo.
Don't panic Dimitry. Things would fall in place. This is a small prison. Let us strike a deal with the guards.

(shouts at the cell guard). Hey mister! (unfastens her diamond necklace and shows it to the approaching Guard).
Swarovski. 24 carat.
Take this.

(looks around and grabs the necklace).
I'll come back when it turns 12. (And he leaves).
Oh! He has left. I think he"ll never turn up.

(Prison clock strikes 12).
(Approaches the cell and whispers). Hey noxious Russians! Here are the keys.
(And he tells them the prison escape route).

question:
Objective

The prison where you are locked up has four levels of security. A digital key is needed to unlock the door at each level. The keys are shared in such a way that any three keys can be used to derive the fourth one. You have managed to get three keys by bribing one of the security guards.
Now, the task is to get the fourth key using these three, so that you can escape the prison.

Attachments
